message.name: NEXT_SINGLE_PAYMENT_TEXT
message.locale: Your next %1s payment of %2s is due on %3d.

message.name: NEXT_MULTIPLE_PAYMENT_TEXT
message.locale: Your next payment of %1s is due on %2d.

message.name: LAST_SINGLE_PAYMENT_TEXT
message.locale: Your last %1s payment of %2s was paid on %3d.

message.name: LAST_MULTIPLE_PAYMENT_TEXT
message.locale: Your last payment of %1s was paid on %2d.
